tool_name: Driving Distance Calculator Between two Points
tool_description: This API provides estimated distance calculations in miles, kilometers, nautical miles, and travel time between two locations, which can be cities, addresses, zip codes, or specific places.

api_list.name: origin and destination location
api_list.description: This API endpoint accepts the origin and destination as city names, place names, addresses, or zip codes to calculate the distance.

required_parameters.name: destination
required_parameters.description: The destination location for the distance calculation.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: The origin location for the distance calculation.
